esqlQuery.esql:
// Alert when oplog headroom drops below 15 minutes, risking replication stalls.
// Guards against negative values and groups by namespace + set name.
FROM metrics-mongodb.replstatus-*
| STATS oplog_headroom_min=MIN(mongodb.replstatus.headroom.min) BY data_stream.namespace, mongodb.replstatus.set_name
| WHERE oplog_headroom_min IS NOT NULL
| EVAL oplog_headroom_min = CASE(oplog_headroom_min >= 0, oplog_headroom_min, 0)
| EVAL oplog_headroom_minutes = TO_DOUBLE(oplog_headroom_min) / 60.0
| WHERE oplog_headroom_minutes < 15
